data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cao, Cheng-Quan, Shi, Jian-Ping, Yin, Zhan (2015): A new species and a key to 19 species of the genus Traulia Stål, 1873 (Orthoptera: Catantopidae) from China. Zootaxa 4040 (4): 494-500, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.4.12
